title: Facechecking the bush is dangerous
body:
Ok, Rito wanted this to be a memes and games thing. Sorry for that, they want this in Gameplay. Not going to happen, since it is meant for Memes and Games. So here we go. 

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/2e/Sawmill_Circular_Saw_Blade.jpg
Anyone recognize this? 
-
-
-
-
-
-
-
If not, its called {{champion:86}} 

http://www.healthline.com/hlcmsresource/images/diabetesmine/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Vanilla-Ice-Cream-Cone.jpg
Sweet and crunchy at the same time. Hmmm.... wonder what Braum thinks of this. 


Look who I found.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/b10b92a75a0d48355b1e1101874a5cc4/tumblr_mhb3c9vArH1rpf23po1_500.gif
Its Illaoi's brother!


And here is Sion's nephew playing with a yordle.
https://67.media.tumblr.com/901122fca760f3faecb265bc38beb814/tumblr_n12ykvRCSI1trmkp7o1_500.gif

Now, onto business. 
I have thought ~~short time~~ long and hard about this matter. I have mained Mordekaiser for some time now and Olaf before that, but the joke has gone old for me. 

I have two guys I really like at the moment  in how they play, and how they are. 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2DFtlNGzMIA/maxresdefault.jpg

and

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/splash_kassadin_base_final1x1920.jpg?itok=YEVcZtmV

I am leaving it in your hands to decide for me, which champion is the best representative of Hades, god of the Underworld.
https://66.media.tumblr.com/10482637d91dcf63e35d98bf37762a70/tumblr_o3nf1xrRcY1uuqhwfo1_500.gif

replies.body:
Zed?  Kassadin?

Why choose them when you can main the bush master himself?  You only had him as your first picture, which means he is clearly the most important.
Death isn't justice.
It is when you yell DEMACIA loud enough.

LOL
http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/184b/m29oqnsmlqiwhjbzg.jpg

{{champion:63}} because 
http://i.imgur.com/Qn7oYmr.gif https://m.popkey.co/d1d31d/5eQeA_s-200x150.gif http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lr8na0T5Ae1qhigt0o1_500.gif http://ift.tt/18PlNn5
Good point, but I don't like his personality.

What about {{champion:41}} ?

http://i.imgur.com/in1QG2a.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/COEjlTAXAAASdrt.png http://statics.vrutal.com/hm/2016/02/VRU_79846_ese_momento.jpg https://media.giphy.com/media/dWAtGh0YAVyoM/giphy.gif
That is true, he requires a lot of skill. Something I am very much short on. LOL
He's  a FUCK TON of fun though, it's worth learning him for sure IMO
I gotta agree with you there.
{{champion:223}} cause of dapper reasons :p
Might be worse considering.
main that thing making noises in the bush thats coming out in like a month
Nope, sorry can't wait that long.
Clearly it's twisted fate with the underworld skin.
That does sound good.

I have decided. My main will become Kassadin, I know there are more votes for other. 
http://37.media.tumblr.com/ce1452f831071a49559bf5d86690b566/tumblr_n4vwxqYRw41rmarhyo1_250.gif busy lying to you guys. 

It wasn't a real option muahahaha. 

Nah, just kidding. For other, there are too many divided options. I have at least 1 garen, 2 TF, 2 Tahm, 2 Karthus, and etc... While Kassadin is a unified front of 13 Kassadin supporters. So thank you very much for helping me make my choice.

Hmm... Hades?

GP, Tahm, Nasus (Anubis is the Egyptian god of the underworld, so there's that too), Darius (maybe), LB (manipulative), etc.

Personally, I'd go with Tahm, GP or Nasus.
i would say karthus as well fits a hades theme

You don't take one thing into account with Anubis. He wields the scales, he basically judges the dead, but he is not the lord. That is Osiris. 
As for Nasus, isn't he a professor or some sorts?

Eh, I'm not really a theologian. :P

Nasus was a general (and a scholar at the same time) -- not a fighter, but a planner and strategist. Incredibly intelligent. Also very empathetic and wasn't savage or a bad person.

Oh, you know what might work? Underworld TF or Underworld Wukong.

Yes... Underworld TF or Wukong, it might work. :) 

I am not a theologian, but the beliefs of older civilizations have intrigued me. I always like to learn more about South American, Greek, Egyptian, African, and Norsemen pagan beliefs.
personally, i feel like kassadin would visually be more of your type , but if you want to truly be the ruler of hell, go for zed. otherwise...well, karthus sounds about right.
Karthus????

{{champion:90}} I might be biased on my reasoning for this... https://i.gyazo.com/171cb3e533af7337c6e4e2e4751eb864.png

But he is really fun, at least IMO.

I do think you are biased.
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m7mh7pNiU81qkqkja.gif

I've been playing since before the update though and got him to rank 5.
https://i.gyazo.com/64f63a76371f3e87ebed23cebf88fc51.png

Seriously though he is fun! You can spread Space Aids! Plus I build him Hybrid.

I think Kassadin fits better with Hades, but I prefer Zed in pretty much every other term.
Also,

KASSAWIN BOIS!
